events.name: SupplierDocumentUpdated
events.description: Captures updates made to supplier-related documentation.

events.name: BatchQualityAssessmentCompleted
events.description: Indicates completion of quality assessments for a batch.

events.name: SupplierAuditCompleted
events.description: Marks the completion of audits related to suppliers.

events.name: ColdChainAlertTriggered
events.description: Triggers alerts when cold chain breaches occur.

commands.name: Update
commands.description: Captures updates made to supplier-related documentation.

commands.name: Complete
commands.description: Indicates completion of quality assessments for a batch.

commands.name: Cancel
commands.description: Triggers alerts when cold chain breaches occur.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with a system managing supplier details to ensure traceability.

integrationPoints.name: QualityAssurance
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with Quality Assurance systems to fetch batch quality results.

integrationPoints.name: ColdChainMonitoring
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with Cold Chain Monitoring systems for real-time alerts.
